codeDemos.title: Galleria Photo Grid
codeDemos.description: A responsive Google Photos/Flickr-esque photo grid with progressive image loading and lightbox viewer. Dynamically organizes photos into equal-width rows, with a minimum aspect ratio for row height. Built with React v16.13. This is the same photo gallery used for the 'Books' section of this site.

codeDemos.title: Uptake CDK and Design System Demo
codeDemos.description: Demo implementation of the Uptake Component Development Kit v3.21.0 and Design System v3.17.1. The components used in this demo I helped create as part of Uptake's Developer Services team. This demo uses the public NPM version of these libraries, as well as Vue.js, Vuex, Vue Router, and the OMDb API.

codeDemos.title: Handlebars Personal Portfolio Site
codeDemos.description: This is the old version of this website. It has been modified for preview purposes and does not include all the sub-pages it originally had. It was built with Handlebars, Assemble, and Grunt. The JavaScript is all plain, vanilla JavaScript.

codeDemos.title: D3 Vue.js Donut Chart
codeDemos.description: Interactive donut chart built with D3.js v4.13.0 and Vue.js v2.5.13. Displays 2017 NASCAR race wins data; originally built for the Uptake Component Development Kit.

codeDemos.title: F1 Data Table App - Vue.js
codeDemos.description: Formula One driver, team, and race data application built with Vue.js v2.4, VueRouter v2.7, Webpack v2.2, Bootstrap v3.2, and APIs from Ergast.com.

codeDemos.title: Accessibility-Optimized Custom Select Input
codeDemos.description: Fully-accessible, custom JavaScript select menu plugin. Demo page shows different features and uses. Originally built for a retail brand.

codeDemos.title: Parallax Promo Page with YouTube API Integration
codeDemos.description: Single-page product promo with parallax scrolling and YouTube API integration. Originally built with Node.js, Harp, and Jade for an electronics brand's social media campaign.

codeDemos.title: F1 Data Table App - Angular.js
codeDemos.description: Multi-page Angular.js app that retrives Formula 1 racing data from the Ergast API. Early proof-of-concept app that is incomplete.
